item.title: Debugging 2024: Lessons learned, wins, and achievements
item.description:
This is a submission for the 2025 New Year Writing challenge: Retroâ€™ing and Debugging 2024.

I’m one of those people who love looking back on a year. Reflecting on what I’ve done, what I’ve learned, and what I want to achieve in the following year. This yearâ€”like many othersâ€”I jumped on Twitch to recap my year, review the stats, and talk about what I want to do moving forward.

Here are the stats, things I learned, and goals I have for 2025. The main reason I like sharing these things is to inspire and motivate others. I hope you find it interesting â¤ï¸.
